extension.news:
Version 1.1.0 (30th April 2021)
New features: * Support live stream * Translate the add-on into French (thank you @DavidHenryThoreau) * Add the description of each video and each instance in the UI * Display a notification when the service has started to let the user know the videos can be played (may be useful on slow devices). The notification can be disabled in the settings. * Display a notification when the download of the video starts * Add the total number of pages in the "Next page" item * Rearrange the settings and make some names more explicit * The video filter from the settings (local/all-local) is now also used when searching videos
